body:
https://ruqqus.com/@Amalek, https://ruqqus.com/@PavementApe, +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime

Their post on Voat: https://voat.co/v/whatever/3917784

No reason given on their profile pages

https://ruqqus.com/post/15u3/what-its-been-like-coming-to/3mii

>An alt account was banned for violating ToS under "inciting violence"

>When one account is banned, the alts are as well automatically.

Banned for "inciting violence" ([before this post was made](https://ruqqus.com/post/1bin/free-speech-and-calls-to-violence)), no specific examples given, I think (correct me if I'm wrong)

They will not be unbanned [since they've told someone to kill themselves](https://ruqqus.com/post/1cop/its-been-over-a-day-since/4dks). (Apparently telling someone to kill themselves is still against the rules.)

Discussion:

* https://ruqqus.com/post/1ddq/wholesome-story-guy-from-rredditalternatives-made/4d0b
* https://ruqqus.com/post/10zr/they-banned-the-guildmaster
* https://ruqqus.com/post/178k/i-would-like-to-know-why
* https://ruqqus.com/post/1cop/its-been-over-a-day-since
* https://ruqqus.com/post/1dt4/its-been-update-two-days-since
* https://ruqqus.com/post/17x3/the-response-i-got-when-i
* https://ruqqus.com/post/1770/you-should-probably-read-the-ruqqus
* https://ruqqus.com/post/1bin/free-speech-and-calls-to-violence/45bz
body_html:
https://ruqqus.com/@Amalek, https://ruqqus.com/@PavementApe, +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime

Their post on Voat: https://voat.co/v/whatever/3917784

No reason given on their profile pages

https://ruqqus.com/post/15u3/what-its-been-like-coming-to/3mii

An alt account was banned for violating ToS under "inciting violence"

When one account is banned, the alts are as well automatically.

Banned for "inciting violence" (before this post was made), no specific examples given, I think (correct me if I'm wrong)

They will not be unbanned since they've told someone to kill themselves. (Apparently telling someone to kill themselves is still against the rules.)

Discussion:

  • https://ruqqus.com/post/1ddq/wholesome-story-guy-from-rredditalternatives-made/4d0b
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/10zr/they-banned-the-guildmaster
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/178k/i-would-like-to-know-why
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/1cop/its-been-over-a-day-since
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/1dt4/its-been-update-two-days-since
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/17x3/the-response-i-got-when-i
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/1770/you-should-probably-read-the-ruqqus
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/1bin/free-speech-and-calls-to-violence/45bz

title: @Amalek and @PavementApe, mods of +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime

body: The admins should enforce the rules, not just ban people because they are shocking or don't like them or are from shitholes like voat. If they did break the rules I agree with their bans. But if the admins are just making random judgement calls with little or no regard for the rules or because the speech is shocking or edgy we're no better than Reddit.
body_html: The admins should enforce the rules, not just ban people because they are shocking or don't like them or are from shitholes like voat. If they did break the rules I agree with their bans. But if the admins are just making random judgement calls with little or no regard for the rules or because the speech is shocking or edgy we're no better than Reddit.

body:
>My understanding is that you have to specify a target, action, and time with the new rules. Do we know exactly what they said?

Unfortunately no.

>The admins tell people to kill themselves in the discord so it should be fair game: https://ruqqus.com/post/1cmz/-

I wonder, if you "jokingly" tell someone to kill themselves, does it still count?
body_html:
My understanding is that you have to specify a target, action, and time with the new rules. Do we know exactly what they said?

Unfortunately no.

The admins tell people to kill themselves in the discord so it should be fair game: https://ruqqus.com/post/1cmz/-

I wonder, if you "jokingly" tell someone to kill themselves, does it still count?

post.title: @Amalek and @PavementApe, mods of +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime

body:
Telling someone to kill themselves isn't illegal in the US nor is it against the Ruqqus ToS, and frankly that's a much broader class of speech than you might realize. What about in a meme? What about someone just saying kys? What about context? What about targeting a group instead of an individual? What about satire? What about example that are obviously not possible or will not result in action?

If you believe that should be bannable then it should be added to the ToS, not enforced on the whims of the admins nor based on the admins opinions of the users. And if you claim to believe in free speech but don't support someone's right to say kys then I'm sorry to say you don't support free speech.
body_html:
Telling someone to kill themselves isn't illegal in the US nor is it against the Ruqqus ToS, and frankly that's a much broader class of speech than you might realize. What about in a meme? What about someone just saying kys? What about context? What about targeting a group instead of an individual? What about satire? What about example that are obviously not possible or will not result in action?

If you believe that should be bannable then it should be added to the ToS, not enforced on the whims of the admins nor based on the admins opinions of the users. And if you claim to believe in free speech but don't support someone's right to say kys then I'm sorry to say you don't support free speech.

post.title: @Amalek and @PavementApe, mods of +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime

body:
>I wonder, if you "jokingly" tell someone to kill themselves, does it still count?

This was brought up in the call to violence guidelines thread but I'm not sure it was ever directly addressed. I think the consensus was that if you hit all 3 criteria (target, action, place/time) you run the risk of having your post deleted. At that point it's up to the admin's judgement.
body_html:
I wonder, if you "jokingly" tell someone to kill themselves, does it still count?

This was brought up in the call to violence guidelines thread but I'm not sure it was ever directly addressed. I think the consensus was that if you hit all 3 criteria (target, action, place/time) you run the risk of having your post deleted. At that point it's up to the admin's judgement.
